Title: The Bachelor Party
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Jacquelyn Reingold
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Bud and Coyote ask Brianna and Mallory to help them throw Sol and Robert's bachelor party. Grace offers to do ANYTHING to cheer up Frankie.
